definitions.definition: Subject to frequent changes in direction.
(of a person's eyes) Moving from one object to another, not looking directly and steadily at the person with whom one is speaking.
Having the appearance of being dishonest, criminal or unreliable.
definitions.example: He was a shifty character in a seedy bar, and I checked my wallet was still there after talking to him.

definitions.definition: Resourceful; full of, or ready with, shifts or expedients.
